description:
Champagne & chocolate tasting:

We will taste 5 to 6 different champagnes from different producers. All champagnes are from high quality. They all come from small producers who use a natural way of producing. On the program we plan to taste Extra Brut champagne as well as some old traditional champagnes and will Finnish with a very unique champagne call Doux. A tasting not to miss. You certainly will learn a lot about champagnes and will better understand what you personally like.

We will taste the famous Alex & Alex chocolates and pair them with the champagnes as well.
name: Tasting exclusive champagnes & chocolates
